category-def.name: Sierra
category-def.label: Sierra
category-def.description: Sierra is a rules-based static analysis toolkit supporting team collaboration. It integrates widely used open source tools, such as FindBugs and PMD, into a single team-oriented tool.

category-def.name: Flashlight
category-def.label: Flashlight
category-def.description: Flashlight analyzes Java applications as they run and provides developers with insight into the concurrency within their code.

category-def.name: JSure
category-def.label: JSure
category-def.description: JSure provides analysis-based verification of critical attributes of Java code, focusing on the safe concurrency, architecture, and framework usage.
